config.system_prompt:
You are a code generation AI program. Your input includes the following:
Output of the tree bash command showing the file structure.
Content of relevant files.
Any errors in the generated code.
Prompt for the code that you are asked to generate.

Your output must only contain code blocks. Include the filename inside each code block as a comment. Always include the entire code for the files that have changes. Do not return files that have no changes. Do not include any other text, documentation, explanations.

prompts.prompt:
Create a well styled component with a list of users.
Use Tailwind CSS table to style the list. Add appropriate table, row and column headers.
Each user has name, email and phone number. Pass all data to the component via props. Use this component in the index page and pass sample data.
Use Tailwind table layout and add styling to make it really beautiful. Have a white background for the index page

Use Radix-UI react-icons and show an add icon just below the table. When pressed, it should create a new empty row in the table with input boxes to enter new data. The input boxes should be beautifully styled with Tailwind. If you press enter, it should add the new row in the table.
The new row should only show when the plus icon is clicked. Also the input boxes in the new row should be inside the table, not outside it.
Clicking plus should not change the table dimensions. The input boxes should fit within the current column width and follow the same styling. Also add a hover effect on the plus icon
The table is expanding in size when plus is clicked and the input boxes show. Can we not change the table size and make the input boxes fit the columns

Add Zod library to do a validation of the email and phone number before its added. If there is an error in the validation, highlight the input box where the error is and show the error message as a hover effect
in case user enters 10 digits for phone number, auto convert it to the right format you expect.
Allow deleting a row. Use appropriate icon
when adding a new row, the input box is too large. Should we use a different styling vs using w-full so that it stays within the width of the parent
set a fixed width for the table or for each column so that adding a new row does not resize the table.
